title: Chuyến Tàu Ly Biệt
lyrics: Tông : Intro :  Dang ni jin jin wo zhe wo de shou Zai san shuo zhe zhen zhong zhen zhong Dang ni shen shen kan zhe wo de yan Zai shan shuo zhe bie song bie song Dang ni zou shang li bie de che zhan Wo zhong yu bu ting de hu huan hu huan Yan kan ni de che zi yue zou yue yuan Wo de xin yi pian ling luan ling luan Qian yan wan yu hai lai bu ji shuo Wo de lei zao yi fan lan fan lan Cong ci wo mi shang le na ge che zhan Duo shao ci zai na er chi chi de kan Li bie de yi mo zong hui chong yan Ni ji hu ba shou er hui duan hui duan He shi lie che neng gou ba ni dai hui Wo zai zhe er chi chi de pan Ni shen zai he fang wo bu guan bu guan Qing wei wo bao zhong qian wan qian wan
